features: YAML-based editing: Define resume content in structured YAML files that are easy to read, edit, and version control.
Multiple output formats: Generate PDF, HTML, and Markdown versions of your resume from a single source file.
Template system: Choose from various professional templates or create custom designs for different industries.
Version control friendly: Track resume changes in Git with clear diffs and maintain multiple versions for different roles.
Automated generation: Build resumes automatically in CI/CD pipelines or with local scripts for consistent formatting.
Section customization: Include or exclude sections like education, experience, and skills based on job requirements.
Multi-language support: Maintain translations of your resume in different languages within the same project.
Metadata management: Store structured data about skills, dates, and achievements for easy updates and reuse.
Web hosting: Deploy generated HTML resumes to static hosting for a personal portfolio website.
Print optimization: Generate print-ready PDFs with proper page breaks and formatting for physical distribution.
Schema validation: Ensure resume data follows the correct structure with built-in validation and error checking.
Export flexibility: Customize output styling with CSS and templates to match personal branding preferences.
